SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model

Class Item

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302simplestock.model.Item
public class Item extends Object
Simple model class for representing an Item with name, purchase date, purchase price, quantity, description, which category it's in, which type it's of, location and if it's insured.

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String itemName, String purchaseDate, double purchasePrice, double quantity, String description, int categoryID, int typeID, String location, boolean insured, String imagePath)
      Constructor for the Item class. Sets every variable with the value in their respective parameters.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item.
      purchaseDate - The date of purchase, is parsed to type LocalDate.
      purchasePrice - The purchase price of the item.
      quantity - How many of the item exists.
      description - The description of the item.
      categoryID - The ID of the category the item exists in.
      typeID - The ID of the type the item is of.
      location - Where the item is located.
      insured - If the item is insured or not.

      public void setCategoryID(int newID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets a new category ID for the item, the ID must be positive, >0.
      Parameters:
      newID - The new ID for the category.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the ID is negative or 0.
